attributes.action: Ban all discrimination(e.g. Sexism, Racism, Homophobia etc) and make it punishable by fine, community service or imprisonment
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Ban all discrimination(e.g. Sexism, Racism, Homophobia etc) and make it punishable by fine, community service or imprisonment, because it is a crime, but doesn't seem to be recognised as one.
